About Us

The New Way to success. advance. progress.

At Get Hired Quickly, we believe in your capacity to find a job whether it’s your dream job or simply the next step in your career. While it is more difficult these days to find employment, we believe with the right kind of assistance, you can see results in short order. We have assisted job seekers for over 13 years and it gives us great pleasure to see our clients find gainful employment.

Who We Are

Get Hired Quickly is a Chicago metro area company that specializes in career counseling and daily job search assistance. Unlike governmental employment or school placement offices, we work your job hunt with you all the time—every day and every week! This intimate level of involvement achieves positive results for you. Nearly all of our new clients are referred to us by past or existing clients.

Our approach to solving job search problems is based on the research studies we have conducted regarding the effectiveness of job-seeking techniques, especially the use of online job boards and social recruiting sites. This research gives us a realistic point of view that other consulting firms do not possess.

Our consulting services are conducted by appointment in Chicago, or via email, telephone or skype for out-of-area clients. To learn more about Get Hired Quickly, please contact us. We look forward to working with you.
